Class Package

  • java.lang.Object
    • Package

  • public class Package
extends java.lang.Object
    Each package contains a set of items. It provides a set for customers to choose from. Inside this package class, you can see the methods to control the list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Package()
      Build a package by asking user the description of package and price
      Package(java.lang.String description, double price)
      Constructor of package.
